title: cmd/gc: make([]int, nil) results in internal fault
body:
by **carlchatfielduntrusted**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/

What is the expected output?
use of untyped nil?

What do you see instead?
prog.go:4: internal compiler error: fault

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g/8g


Which operating system are you using?
linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
1.2

Please provide any additional information below.
Other bad arg types lead to similarly malformed errors
http://play.golang.org/p/Yg9HViuQHy
